bike.description: Specialized FACT 8r carbon, Az1 construction, compact race design

S-Works FACT carbon stem, 31.8mm handlebar clamp
S-Works SL FACT carbon aero handlebar, short-reach drop, 31.8mm clamp
Body Geometry Bar Phat, cork ribbon w/ 2.5mm gel padding
Shimano Dura-Ace, 10-speed STI, flight deck compatible
Shimano Dura-Ace, 10-speed STI, flight deck compatible
FSA MegaExo, integrated exterior cartridge bearings, alloy
Mavic Ksyrium Elite, 18 hole, Mavic QR
Mavic Ksyrium Elite, 20 hole, Mavic QR
Body Geometry Toup√© Team, superlight foam, carbon reinforced base, hollow Ti rails, microfiber cover
Specialized Pro SL, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, 27.2mm
